description: You are in a room with an entrance to the third level of the tower.  A

19917.name: A Stone Stairwell

description: From 275 feet up, too the east, west, and south you can see almost all
of Thoth's Realm!  To the north is the chamber of the first {8Draconian
{4ArchMage{0, long deafeated he is back as his undead Avatar.
19997.name: Balcony over the Fanatics' Tower

description: If jump jump really straight, you could land at the bottom of the tower without
a scrape.  Though, I don't know anyone who has *grin
Loosely based on a tower in Final Fantasy III, the Fanatics' Tower is my first
work in area building.  This tower is 13 stories tall (averaging 6 rooms wide),
and contains a total of 100 all original rooms.  The first story starts with
level 75 mobs, and their level increases slightly as you go up.  Each story
has a "boss" mobile with some pretty nice weapons.  The final boss gives you
a very special prize if beaten.
{&-{$Artema{&-{0 the {8Dragon {4ArchMage{0.
You hear a strange droning sound from somewhere nearby.  A huge tower bustling
with activity lies to the north.
Off to the left, a big sign is stuck in the ground.
19900.name: Path to the Fanatics' Tower

description: To the north you see the Fanatics' Tower.
You see a path traveled thousands of times to the south.
This is the chamber of a lone {2Half-Orc {0Archmage.  He stands here
protecting the fourth level of the tower.  The menacing minotaur ponders
your first move and waits with a particularly nasty counter in mind.
19931.name: Chamber of a {2Half-Orc {BArchmage{0

description: You are on the second story of the Fanatics' Tower.  The south wall is non-

description: You are in the entrance way of the Fanatic's Tower.  A staircase in the

19902.name: A Stone Stairwell

description: A very old staircase leads up to the next level of the tower.
The exit is to the south.
Icewine is bubbling over the edge here!  You can't get close enough
to drink any unless you jump!
A Mystical Waterfall of IceWine bubbles from the ground here and spills over
the side of the mountain.  You would think the view here would be better, but
you're over the 5th layer of clouds and all you see is white.  Far below is a
ledge... Dare you risk the jump?
19998.name: Top of Thoth's Great Mountain

description: You are on the eighth story of the Fanatics' Tower.  The south wall is non-

19959.name: Fanatics' Tower:  Floor 8

description: You wonder how Realm could have gotten this far!  But she just couldn't
make it to the top...

gusts of wind slow your progress.  The corpse of Realm is here.

previous ones.

description: This door isn't much to look at.
This thing is huge, at least 100 total rooms.  You will come across some very
powerful enemies on your trek to the top.
These guys are over in the corner discussing the untilmate treasure to be found
at the top of the tower.  One offers to tell you a secret for 10000 gold.  Heh
These guys are like zombies, walking around in circles chanting something you
can't make out.  You better walk around them.
You are standing in front of the Fanatics' Tower.  The droning noise is coming
from some robed fanatics walking in a circle in front of the door to the tower.
Some guys are sitting off to the left whispering.
19901.name: Entrance to the Fanatics' Tower

description: You see a huge door leading inside the tower.
Don't go that way, the cool area is to the north!

description: This room is for all the weary travelers about to journey up to battle
the {4Master{0 of the {8Tower{0.  Accept these gracious gifts from her God,
Lathander.  For it is her duty to restore and renew all life in the Realms.
19993.name: Healing room

description:
This is an apprentice to the {3Minotaur{0 archmage.  He has devoted his
life to learning magic from the minotaur and protecting the third
level of the tower.

description:
This is an apprentice to the {2Half-Orc{0 archmage.  He has devoted his
life to learning magic from the half-orc and protecting the sixth
level of the tower.
19907.room_name: An apprentice to the half-orc archmage is here to stop your progress.
19907.name: {0A Half-Orc Apprentice~

his life to learning magic from the Master and protecting the eleventh

19912.room_name: An apprentice to the Master of the Tower is here to stop your progress.

This is an apprentice to the {4Master {0of the {8Tower{0.  He has devoted
his life to learning magic from the Master and protecting the twelvth
level of the tower.
19913.room_name: An apprentice to the Master of the Tower is here to stop your progress.
19913.name: {0A Master Apprentice~

description:
His midnight cloak whirling about him, this lythe drow guard weaves his
blades in a intricate dance of whirling death.  The symbol of the {8Drow
{0Archmage gleams brightly , glowing with an arcane radiance from its
resting place upon the breast of the guard..
19914.room_name: A dark elven warrior stands here, his bare blades bright in the dim light.
19914.name: A {8Drow {0Guard~

description:
Standing well over 9 feet tall, this huge minotaur would love nothing
more than to smash intruders into little greasy piles.  Branded with the
symbol of the {3Minotaur {0Archmage the bovine warrior glares this way and
that, his massive hands clenched into tight fists...
19915.room_name: A huge, armored minotaur guard is here, snorting in annoyance.
19915.name: A Minotaur Guard~

description:
Wearing thick plate mail etched with the symbol of the {3Minotaur{0
Archmage, this minotaur warrior has pledged his life for that of his
master.  Growling at your approach, he whips out a saw edged, two
handed sword and steps to bar your path...
19916.room_name: A towering minotaur dressed in full black plate stands here, hand on swordhilt.
19916.name: An Elite Minotaur Guard~

description:
Adorned in ill-kept armor bearing the symbol of the {2Half-Orc{0
archmage, this short warrior clutches a rusty, chipped sword in his hairy
hands.  Snorting through his upturned nose, the guard nervously flicks his
tounge across his single protruding tusk, as beady red eyes keep a constant
watch
19917.room_name: A half-orc guard stands here, warily glancing in all directions.
19917.name: A Half-Orc Guard~

description:
Adorned in ill-kept armor bearing the symbol of the {2Half-Orc{0
archmage, this short warrior clutches a rusty, chipped sword in his hairy
hands.  Snorting through his upturned nose, the guard nervously flicks his
tounge across his single protruding tusk, as beady red eyes keep a constant
watch
19918.room_name: A half-orc guard stands here, warily glancing in all directions.
19918.name: A Half-Orc Guard~

description:
Wearing well cared for chain mail, this half-orc guard seems to be in
much better health than the others you have seenso far.  His polished blade waves
in the air before you, its smooth surface etched with the symbols of the
{3Half-Orc{0 Archmage.
19919.room_name: Holding a gleaming longsword, this half-orc warrior stands ready for battle.
19919.name: An Elite Half-Orc Guard~

description:
Wearing well cared for chain mail, this half-orc guard seems to be in
much better health than the others you have seenso far.  His polished blade
waves in the air before you, its smooth surface etched with the symbols of
the {3Half-Orc{0 Archmage.
19920.room_name: Holding a gleaming longsword, this half-orc warrior stands ready for battle.
19920.name: An Elite Half-Orc Guard~

description:
Here stands a Titan warrior, ready to defend the tower to its
death.  Wearing a shiny steel breastplate bearing the symbol of the
{^Titan{0 Archmage, he readies his sword to cleave into your thin flesh.
19921.room_name: A mammoth humanoid stands here, eyeing you suspiciously.
19921.name: {0A Titan Warrior~

description:
Before you towers a gigantic titan warrior.  Armored in a fine set
of plate mail bearing the symbol of the {^Titan{0 Archmage, he stands
waiting, waiting for some unfortunate victim to feel the wrath of his
two-handed sword.
19922.room_name: A titan warrior waits here patiently for someone to hack into.
19922.name: {0A Titan Guard~

description:
A titan with muscles rippling from every inch of its body is here
guarding the way.  Its huge maul bears the symbol of the {^Titan{0
Archmage, showing who his loyalty is to.  Its tight-fitting plate mail
looks a size or two too small for its well-muscled body.
19923.room_name: A well-built titan stands watch here, vigilantly guarding the tower.
19923.name: {0An Elite Titan Guard~

description:
A warrior of unknown race stands here clad in well-polished full
plate mail.  The symbol of the {4Master{0 glows brightly from its shield
as it readies its sword to cleave into your body.
19924.room_name: A warrior in full plate mail readies its sword for battle.
19924.name: {0A Master Guard~

description:
Standing before you is a knight clad in every piece of armor
imaginable, not even the smallest opening has been left on its body. 
The symbol of the {4Master{0 shines forth from its breastplate.  It begins
swinging its flail about, looking to smash in your puny skull.
19925.room_name: A fully armored warrior is here, bent on smashing your skull.
19925.name: {0A Master Knight~

description:
The Adept of Lathander is here to heal and renew.  She has staked
this room out to help all defeat the Master of the Tower.  Accept the
blessing of her God.
19926.room_name: An Adept of Lathander is here to renew.
19926.name: {0An Adept of Lathander~

description:
Standing here is a reclusive drow archmage, studying to be a higher
protecter in the tower.  If only he let no one pass through his floor
he could be moved up to a less dangerous position.
19927.room_name: A dark-skinned elven wizard stands here reading his spellbook.
19927.name: A {8Drow {0Archmage{0~

description:
Standing here is a monsterous minotaur archmage, studying to be a
higher protecter in the tower.  If only he let no one pass through his
floor he could be moved up to a less dangerous position.
19928.room_name: A tall bull-headed humanoid towers over you.
19928.name: A {3Minotaur{0 Archmage~

description:
Standing here is a hulking half-orc archmage, studying to be a
higher protecter in the tower.  If only he let no one pass through his
floor he could be moved up to a less dangerous position.
19929.room_name: A broad shouldered half-orc garbed in robes levitates here.
19929.name: {0A {2Half-Orc {0Archmage~

description:
Standing here is a gigantic titan archmage, studying to be a higher
protecter in the tower.  If only he let no one pass through his floor
he could be moved up to a less dangerous position.
19930.room_name: A humongous human-looking creature stands here preparing a spell.
19930.name: {0A {^Titan{0 Archmage~

description:
Hiryuu is a beautiful silvery Dragon.  This one is
quite loyal to her master, the great Platinum Dragon.
19900.room_name: A Silvery Dragon is here, keeping Artema's cliff clean.
19900.name: Hiryuu, the Silvery Dragon~

description:
This figure wears a mask over his face that matches the color of his robes.  You swear you hear a snicker come from under the mask, but you can't be sure.  He is obviously the cause for all the
strange weather lately, but why was there only fire and ice, yet no real lightning?
19901.room_name: A masked and robed figure stands here unmoving.
19901.name: {0The {4Master{0 of the {8Tower{0~
